152DFAnatoli Maslyonkin(1930-06-26)26 June 1930 (aged 27)8 Spartak Moscow
163MFViktor Tsarev(1931-06-02)2 June 1931 (aged 27)1 Dynamo Moscow
174FWAleksandr Ivanov(1928-04-14)14 April 1928 (aged 30)0 Zenit Leningrad
184FWValentin Bubukin(1933-04-23)23 April 1933 (aged 25)0 Lokomotiv Moscow
194FWGennadi Gusarov(1937-03-11)11 March 1937 (aged 21)0 Torpedo Moscow
204FWYuri Falin(1937-04-02)2 April 1937 (aged 21)1 Torpedo Moscow
214FWGenrich Fedosov(1932-12-06)6 December 1932 (aged 25)1 Dynamo Moscow
222DFVladimir Yerokhin(1930-04-10)10 April 1930 (aged 28)0 Dynamo Kyiv
\n

 England[edit]

\n

Head coach: Walter Winterbottom

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n
No.Pos.PlayerDate of birth (age)CapsClub
11GKColin McDonald(1930-10-15)15 October 1930 (aged 27)1 Burnley
22DFDon Howe(1935-10-12)12 October 1935 (aged 22)7 West Bromwich Albion
32DFTommy Banks(1929-11-10)10 November 1929 (aged 28)1 Bolton Wanderers
43MFEddie Clamp(1934-09-14)14 September 1934 (aged 23)1 Wolverhampton Wanderers
52DFBilly Wright (captain)(1924-02-06)6 February 1924 (aged 34)92 Wolverhampton Wanderers
62DFBill Slater(1927-04-29)29 April 1927 (aged 31)6 Wolverhampton Wanderers
73MFBryan Douglas(1934-05-27)27 May 1934 (aged 24)7 Blackburn Rovers
84FWBobby Robson(1933-02-18)18 February 1933 (aged 25)2 West Bromwich Albion
94FWDerek Kevan(1935-03-06)6 March 1935 (aged 23)7 West Bromwich Albion
104FWJohnny Haynes(1934-10-17)17 October 1934 (aged 23)20 Fulham
113MFTom Finney(1922-04-05)5 April 1922 (aged 36)73 Preston North End
121GKEddie Hopkinson(1935-10-29)29 October 1935 (aged 22)6 Bolton Wanderers
131GKAlan Hodgkinson*(1936-08-16)16 August 1936 (aged 21)4 Sheffield United
142DFPeter Sillett(1933-02-01)1 February 1933 (aged 25)3 Chelsea
153MFRonnie Clayton(1934-08-05)5 August 1934 (aged 23)20 Blackburn Rovers
162DFMaurice Norman(1934-05-08)8 May 1934 (aged 24)0 Tottenham Hotspur
173MFPeter Brabrook(1937-11-08)8 November 1937 (aged 20)0 Chelsea
183MFPeter Broadbent(1933-05-15)15 May 1933 (aged 25)0 Wolverhampton Wanderers
194FWBobby Smith(1933-02-22)22 February 1933 (aged 25)0 Tottenham Hotspur
204FWBobby Charlton(1937-10-11)11 October 1937 (aged 20)3 Manchester United
213MFAlan A\'Court(1934-09-30)30 September 1934 (aged 23)1 Liverpool
223MFMaurice Setters*(1936-12-16)16 December 1936 (aged 21)0 West Bromwich Albion
\n
    \n
  • Some sources state that England took only 20 squad members to the 1958 tournament in Sweden, and their squad lists do not include Alan Hodgkinson or Maurice Setters. Other sources, including FIFA\'s official World Cup records, list 22 players on the squad and include both Hodgkinson and Setters. The likelihood is that these two players were included on the squad list submitted to FIFA but did not travel to the tournament. [2]
    • \n
\n

 Austria[edit]

\n

Head coach: Karl Argauer

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n
